command_line: mkdir -p circos/conf/ circos/data/ &&  ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/d/d/a/dataset_dda373f2-d266-4a38-bd59-5de96c47c5a5.dat' genomeref.fa &&  python '/cvmfs/cloud.galaxyproject.org/tools/toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/circos/df7356989ac1/circos/karyotype-from-fasta.py' genomeref.fa > circos/conf/karyotype.txt &&  python '/cvmfs/cloud.galaxyproject.org/tools/toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/circos/df7356989ac1/circos/karyotype-colors.py' `grep -c '^chr\s' 'circos/conf/karyotype.txt'` > 'circos/conf/karyotype-colors.conf' &&  touch circos/conf/karyotype-colors.conf &&    cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmpdzxzffb9' circos/conf/circos.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmp5c191odn' circos/conf/ticks.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmpfynr4isv' circos/conf/ideogram.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmp6snv297f'  circos/conf/data.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmpmosck1b2'  circos/conf/links.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/19/configs/tmp6zwylbr3' circos/conf/galaxy_test_case.json &&  cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/e/5/dataset_3e56c192-e0c2-4018-a6e9-09ac2dce6f32.dat' circos/data/data-0.txt && cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/e/5/dataset_3e56c192-e0c2-4018-a6e9-09ac2dce6f32.dat' circos/data/data-1.txt && cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/8/6/dataset_3867adaf-8445-43b2-9640-3e06cf43f304.dat' circos/data/data-2.txt &&  cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/1/0/dataset_310050fc-99a3-4625-a208-1d5641c0acc9.dat' circos/data/links-0.txt &&   circos -conf circos/conf/circos.conf -noparanoid

params.ideogram: {"angle_offset": "-90", "angle_orientation": "clockwise", "bands": {"band_stroke_color": "#000000", "band_stroke_thickness": "0", "band_transparency": "3", "fill_bands": true, "show_bands": true}, "chromosomes_reverse": null, "ideogram_labels": {"parallel": true, "radius_offset": "0.075", "show_label": true, "size": "24"}, "limit_chromosomes": null, "pairwise_spacing": [], "radius": "0.9", "spacing": "0.5", "thickness": "30.0", "units": "kb"}
